attributes.action: demonstrate his commitment to road safety
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To do this we require that the government remove all automatic speed enforcement equipment from the roads of the UK and replace them with significantly more human Traffic Officers.

This would allow offending motorists not only to be penalised but also educated. Automatic equipment is not able to make judgements on road conditions, circumstances etc.
